name: Confessions Part Three Quiz / Test | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: In addition to trying out his lover's chapstick, what else did the singer experiment with?
questions.explanation:
Her nosehair trimmer.

	"I borrowed your chapstick from you I tried out your nose hair trimmer too."

True.

	The diamond ring is actually cubic zirconium. Cubic zirconium is widely used as a diamond substitute, but is a little softer than actual diamond.

questions.text: Which family pet was the unfortunate victim when the singer had too much to drink?
questions.explanation:
The dog.

	"I threw up on your dog last time I had too much to drink." admits the singer.

questions.text: Complete the lyric: "Oh and sometimes in private, I really like to dress up as __________________ and spank myself with a hockey stick."
questions.explanation:
Shirley Temple.

	This is by far the most disturbing confession in the entire song. No wonder his girlfriend is mad at him at the end of the song!

questions.text: What did the singer remove using his lover's toothbrush?
options: The ring around the toilet bowl
questions.explanation:
Bathroom grout.

	"Baby forgive me I'm still trying to figure out  Why I used your toothbrush to clean off the bathroom grout."

questions.text: The singer has a good relationship with his boss.
questions.explanation:
False.

	"My boss thinks I'm a jerk Didn't get that raise!" proclaims the singer as one of his more mundane confessions.

questions.text: How long has the singer gone without changing his underwear?
questions.explanation:
27 days.

	I'm fairly certain this is a record even among us guys!

questions.text: The singer confuses his lover's name. What is his first guess?
questions.explanation:
Debbie.

	"I'm so sorry Debbie, I mean Bridget!"

questions.text: What happened to the buttered toast?
questions.correct: The singer dropped it on the floor and then gave it to his lover anyway
options: The singer dropped it on the floor and then ate it anyway
The singer burnt it very badly
The singer dropped it on the floor and made the dog eat it
questions.explanation:
The singer dropped it on the floor and then gave it to his lover anyway.

	Well, it was nice of him to make toast for her anyway. I made my girlfriend dinner last night and because we listen to this song so much, her first reaction was not surprise but suspicion!

questions.text: Does the dress make the singer's lover look fat?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	"And I lied, yes that dress makes you look fat!" I think that is one of the worst things you could ever say to a lady, even if she asks for your opinion.
